name: cue_points
title: Cue Points
description: Learn how to set up Cue Points and respond to Cue Point events
notes: Cue points are getting attached, but don't seem to do anything...do they need to be activated somehow?

control_sets.title: Starting a KalturaSession
control_sets.tip:
Start a KalturaSession (ks) by supplying your Partner ID and Admin Secret.

You can find your info in the [Kaltura Management Console](http://kmc.kaltura.com/index.php/kmc/kmc4#account|integration)

control_sets.title: Select a Media Entry
control_sets.tip:
Choose a video from your library to add cue points to.

You'll also need to select a uiConf that has cue point tracking enabled. To enable cue point tracking, [visit the KMC](http://kmc.kaltura.com/index.php/kmc/kmc4#studio|universal_studio), click the Monetization ($) tab, and check "Track cue points" under the Vast tab

control_sets.title: Adding a Cue Point
control_sets.tip: You can use the form below to add cue points to your video.
